wikipedia_page.main: Paul David Atkins (born 11 June 1966) is an English first-class cricketer. Atkins was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm off break. He was born in Aylesbury, Buckinghamshire.

response: * Paul Atkins (rugby league), former New Zealand rugby league player
